languages.text: {n}Губернатор утомленно глядит на сенешаля из-под тяжелых век:{/n} "Возможно, пришлому ставленнику Леди Теодоры нет дела до священных традиций наших предков-основателей. Однако {name} фон Валанциус — потомок истинных детей Даргонуса".

{n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор утомленно глядит на сенешаля из-под тяжелых век:{/n} "Возможно, пришлому ставленнику Леди Теодоры нет дела до священных традиций наших предков-основателей. Однако {name} фон Валанциус — потомок истинных детей Даргонуса".

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

{n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

{n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

{n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

{n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

languages.text: {n}厄本的眼皮沉重地耷拉着，疲惫地看着阿贝拉德。{/n}“或许西奥多拉夫人安插的暴发户并不在乎我们立朝祖先的神圣传统……但{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯是真正的达戈努斯人的后裔！”
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}厄本的眼皮沉重地耷拉着，疲惫地看着阿贝拉德。{/n}“或许西奥多拉夫人安插的暴发户并不在乎我们立朝祖先的神圣传统……但{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯是真正的达戈努斯人的后裔！”

languages.text: {n}Urbend mira cansado a Abelard con ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «Tal vez a un arribista instalado por lady Theodora no le importen las tradiciones sagradas de los fundadores. ¡Pero {name} von Valancius es descendiente de los verdaderos hijos de Dargonus!».
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend mira cansado a Abelard con ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «Tal vez a un arribista instalado por lady Theodora no le importen las tradiciones sagradas de los fundadores. ¡Pero {name} von Valancius es descendiente de los verdaderos hijos de Dargonus!».

languages.text: {n}アーベントは重い瞼の下から、疲れたようにアベラルドを見つめる。{/n}「シオドーラ様が遺した成り上がり者は、我らが建国の父祖の神聖なる伝統を重んじないのかもしれませんが、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様はダルゴナスの真の子供たちの末裔です」
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}アーベントは重い瞼の下から、疲れたようにアベラルドを見つめる。{/n}「シオドーラ様が遺した成り上がり者は、我らが建国の父祖の神聖なる伝統を重んじないのかもしれませんが、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様はダルゴナスの真の子供たちの末裔です」

languages.text: {n}Urbend hebt die schweren Augenlider und sieht Abelard müde an.{/n} "Vielleicht ist einem von Lady Theodora eingesetzten Emporkömmling nicht an den heiligen Traditionen unserer Gründerväter gelegen. Aber {name} von Valancius stammt von den wahren Kindern von Dargonus ab."
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend hebt die schweren Augenlider und sieht Abelard müde an.{/n} "Vielleicht ist einem von Lady Theodora eingesetzten Emporkömmling nicht an den heiligen Traditionen unserer Gründerväter gelegen. Aber {name} von Valancius stammt von den wahren Kindern von Dargonus ab."

languages.text: {n}Urbend tourne un regard fatigué vers Abélard.{/n} « Le parvenu promu par dame Théodora se fiche peut-être des traditions instaurées par nos ancêtres, Mais {name} von Valancius est {mf|le descendant|la descendante} des vrais enfants de Dargonus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend tourne un regard fatigué vers Abélard.{/n} « Le parvenu promu par dame Théodora se fiche peut-être des traditions instaurées par nos ancêtres, Mais {name} von Valancius est {mf|le descendant|la descendante} des vrais enfants de Dargonus ! »

languages.text: {n}Urbend, ağırlaşmış göz kapaklarının altından yorgun hâlde Abelard'a bakıyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'nın atadığı sonradan görmeler, düzenimizi kuran atalarımızın kutsal geleneklerini önemsemiyor olabilir. {name} von Valancius ise Dargonus'un evlatlarının soyundan gelmektedir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend looks at Abelard tiredly from under his heavy eyelids.{/n} "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors. But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend ağırlaşmış göz kapaklarının altından yorgun bir şekilde Abelard'a bakıyor.{/n} "Belki Leydi Theodora'nın atadığı sonradan görmeler düzenimizin kurucusu atalarımızın kutsal geleneklerini önemsemiyor olabilirler. {name} von Valancius ise Dargonus'un evlatlarının gerçek bir üyesidir!"
